transcripts.text: I knew it going in.  He was a con man.  I knew he was a con man.  And he pulled the biggest con in the world.  when he won the election.

I don't think that this is something new.  I think that he's been lacking in integrity and character for a long time.  I don't think he's ever had any.  He is a symptom of what's happening.  He's a particularly loathsome.  But he's symptomatic of the messaging that's coming from Fox News and other conservatives.  outlets.  The word conservative doesn't mean what it used to.

I just attended the swamp tour in D.C.  where the P-triple C and other progressive organizations took registered Republicans and independent voters around D.C.  to take a look at Donald Trump's swampiest examples of corruption.  We went to see the Trump International Hotel, the EPA, the Department of Labor, and they talked about how all of these different institutions have been corrupted under the Trump administration.

The purpose of this tour is to show that Trump's corruption goes beyond the Ukraine scandal, that it runs deep, that It runs through the administration.  And what we really have is the systemic corruption problem of self-dealing happening at almost every agency in this government.  It's as if you had to have sued the department to then become the department head.

The EPA one is one of the worst.  One of the people who fought the EPA now gets to run it.  That makes a lot of sense.  I spoke to three Republican voters, some of them registered Republicans, but all of them have become disgusted with Donald Trump, and they made that clear to me on this tour.
